articles.author: Susana Polo
articles.title: The X-Men’s Jonathan Hickman will revolutionize Marvel again with GODS - Polygon
articles.description: Jonathan Hickman and Valerio Schiti will remake how gods work in Marvel Comics with GODS, a new series debuting fall 2023. Check out a trailer for the comic series.
articles.content: Jonathan Hickman and Valerio Schiti will remake the Marvel fundament this fall

articles.author: Amrit Dhillon
articles.title: Priyanka Chopra Jonas: Bollywood’s fair skin fixation helped drive me away - The Guardian
articles.description: Actor and former Miss World announced move to US at pinnacle of her fame in India eight years ago
articles.content:
The Indian actor Priyanka Chopra Jonas has spoken of how Bollywoods enduring obsession with fair skin was one of the reasons she left the industry to try her luck in Hollywood eight years ago.
